root: ^You can hear Nessie before she comes into view of the desk, her lab coat swishing against the carpet.
^At last, maybe she can stop asking you for things you are unable to give her.
^“I am going to ask around to see if I can get any help, and then go swim in the lake anyways.”
^“Things are a little desperate, so no harm in just trying, right?”
^<i>You are a little shocked at this brazen proposal. Didn’t she just mention not being able to swim very deep??<i/>
^Regardless, you don’t want to deal with the legal fallout of a guest harming themselves on Motel property.
^How are you going to stop her from doing this?

monster: ^You realise far too late this was possibly the most insensitive thing you could have said. Massive failure. Catastrophic failure.
^Really?????? You think I haven’t heard that one before?”
^“I thought you wanted to help me out, not insult me!”
^You try to explain that you didn’t think the comment through, but the effort to convince her outweighs the result. The insult has already sunk in.
lakedanger: ^“Since when have calm, scenic lakes been a source of danger?"
^"Besides, I swam through there on my way in!”
^Man, your logic wasn’t very sound for this argument.
^“It’s nice of you to worry, but I can handle myself. It’ll just be a little tricky is all.”
fuss: ^“I don’t know what all your fuss is about, considering I am literally part aquatic.”

^You realise your momentary panic about Motel health insurance and injury claims somewhat caused you to forget that your guest is a little more equipped for this scenario than another creature would be.
^“Go on, ask your questions, I can tell you are curious. Believe me, I get it all the time…”
scales: ^You try your very best to think of something smart to ask her, something impressive.
^She looks stunned, but hopefully not offended…
^“I know I said I was reptilian but not like that, silly!!”
^“Honestly I don’t know why they don’t educate people on these things in school…”
^Nessie seems bemused, but doesn’t explain further. I guess some things you will never get answers to.
bepolite: ^You feel too shy, simply opting to shrug and mumble a vague statement instead.
^“I know it’s a bit scary to ask, don’t worry!"
^"I can totally tell you I am able to slightly breathe underwater, for a short time.”
^“Also I get dehydrated very quickly and can’t deal with cold temperatures! I could go on, but I don’t want to scare you off with too many facts.”
^You’re grateful for the quick save. Plus, a few queries were answered for you.
toofamiliar: ^“At least we got that awkwardness out of the way! Now we can move on to the honeymoon stage.”
^If this is her idea of getting to know someone, you suppose being overly confident is one way to go about it… You laugh awkwardly.
^“Just kidding! I do feel like I’ve gotten to know you a bit now though.”
^“My problem is far from solved, so I’m sure we’ll meet again very soon!!”
^“I’m gonna go ask around for flippers……”
^You really do hope she manages to heave better luck with the guests than you.
^Looking back at your computer fills you with a sense of guilt. Maybe you can sort something out. Maybe…
